ygData.subject: Re: Dragoon Drik
ygData.msgSnippet: whats a pgt? ... From: Gary Qui Hong Loong  To:  Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 4:11 PM Subject: Re:
ygData.messageBody:
whats a pgt?


----- Original Message -----
From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 4:11 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Dragoon Drik


> From: "Gary Qui Hong Loong" <kanglun@...>
>
> ?? I thought I kiled enough for u ppl to get back the lvl?
> btw, I want a pgt too.....
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> To: '* Singapore EQ Mailing List' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 10:09
> Subject: [sg-everquest] Dragoon Drik
>
>
> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> > Last night Garren, Einan, Flyingfox, Deadflower and I went hunting for
the
> > Dvinn dagger in CB.
> >
> > We managed to kill Dvinn few times but only found ONE Dragoon Dirk, with
> > the following "price":
> >
> > - Garren died once.
> > - Ziltus died 3 times (one in water) and drop lvl.
> > - FF died 2-3 times and drop lvl.
> > - Einan died ?? times (lost count, hehe).
> > - DF died at least 2 times.
> >
> > Later FF and I managed to lvl back but one more death we will drop lvl
> > again.
> >
> > Just to let everyone know, so far all the Dvinns we killed are lvl 20.
> > H/w, he is very tough as a lvl 20 mob and can inflict 40 dam on Garren
> > (lvl 26 paladin), not to mentioned how he whack the casters
> > up-down-left-right.
> >
> > His dagger, Dragoon Dirk, is a piercing weap but u can arm it as a
> throwing
> > weap if you are using 2HB, it gives u extra Dex and some SV. One thing
to
> > take note, u MUST armed ya main weap AFTER arming the dagger, otherwise
> the
> > dagger will become ya default weap even if u put it as a throwing weap.
> >
> > Hopefully we can get FF a dagger by tonight and we can all go back to HH
> to
> > camp for PGT with Leshrec (money money money, here we come!), heh.
> >
> >
> > Ziltus, 6th circle High Elf Nuker.
> >
